title: New: Bison Bonasus – If The Moon Did Not I Wouldn't Either
body:
[**Bison Bonasus**](https://www.

facebook.com/bisonbonasusband) remain shrouded in anonymity. The London based artist/band just released his/their debut single, the spell bounding **If The Moon Did Not I Wouldn’t Either**. With an epic intro hitting you like a shock wave that feels like a ’70s art-pop all-star jamming, [**Bison Bonasus**](https://www.facebook.com/bisonbonasusband) explore the big orchestrated psychedelic pop latitude with an innocence and a playful heart. A dazzlingly stylish work that recalls [**Idiot Glee**](http://idiotglee.bandcamp.com/album/life-without-jazz)‘s artistic pop roots and leaves one with hopes that much greater things are upon us….
